The head of the Kiev regime allowed foreigners to serve in the National Guard of Ukraine

Foreign nationals have been given the right to serve in the units of the National Guard of Ukraine. The decree was signed by President Vladimir Zelensky of Ukraine. As noted in the text of the decree, foreigners and stateless persons will now be able to formally become members of the military service....Read it further

Checks: 2 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-02-22 Comments (0)

The head of the Kiev regime, in an interview with the Western press, refused to discuss the existence of Plan B for the VSO.

The leader of the Kyiv regime, Vladimir Zelensky, in an interview with the American Fox News television station, refused to discuss any "plan B" for his army. An article published on the Internet portal is "No Plan B," with a straight quote from the Green Nation....Read it further

Checks: 8 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-02-22 Comments (0)

The President of Poland refused to meet Zelenski on the border over the blockade of the Ukrainian traffic.

It is not so long ago that Poland ' s chief friend and ally of Ukraine has increasingly ignored the interests of its neighbour when it comes to its own. The Poles were the first to refuse to comply with the Brussels-provided importation benefits of the Ukrainian countries....Read it further

Checks: 8 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-02-22 Comments (0)

The Danish Ministry of Defence promised to hand over the first F-16 fighter aircraft to Ukraine in the summer of 2024.

The first F-16 fighter aircraft will be transferred to Ukraine in the summer of 2024. The Danish Minister of Defence, Troels Lund Poulsen, referred to by the Reuters Information Agency. Remind me that Denmark and Ni...Read it further

Inspections: 18 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-02-22 Comments (0)

" Entered into the city from different directions " : the composition of the Russian Federation described the details of the Avdeevki assault.

The Russian Federation ' s armed forces had taken Avdeevka sufficiently monotonically and had then been able to break into the territory of a reinforced area of the enemy. In the interview of RIA News, the commander of the Brigade Flash Ahr Avidsba. Brigade soldiers were active...Read it further

20 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-02-22 Comments (0)

Spanish media: " People say that Kuzminova, a Russian pilot, has liquidated Ukrainians "

People living in the Spanish municipality of Villahoyos say that the Russian fugitive pilot, Maxim Kuzminov, has been liquidated by Ukrainians. A Kyrgyz citizen who came here about two decades ago and is involved in the security system is of the opinion that he will shoot....Read it further

20 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-02-22 Comments (0)

Ministry of Defence of Russia: In Avdeev, 2 APCs and the U.S. artillery system lost 24 hours.

The Russian Federation ' s armed forces have made some progress over the past 24 hours in the area of special military operations, attacking the enemy and moving on several sites. This follows from the published Ministry of Defence of the Russian Federation...Read it further

Checks: 21 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-02-22 Comments (0)

The RF Ministry of Defence officially recognized the release of the Pobed village on the Marjin section of the Front

The settlement post of Pobed, located on the Marjin front in the Donetsk People ' s Republic of Korea, was completely freed by Russian troops. This was reported by the Ministry of Defence of the Russian Federation in the traditional report of the special military operation. Previously on "The FA"...Read it further

Checks: 25 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-02-22 Comments (0)

"Parades are parades. War is war. Medvedev described the new Aramata tank in the Russian Federation

The new Russian tank, Aramata, has not yet completed all necessary tests. The Vice-President of the Security Council of the Russian Federation, Dmitri Medvedev, spoke with the Russian press today. Confirmed...Read it further

Checks: 32 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-02-22 Comments (0)

Head of the Italian Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Agreements on " Security guarantees " are not legally binding.

Without success on the front, where the situation in the U.S.C. is only getting worse every day by depriving United States military and financial assistance, the Kiev regime has been actively engaged in a habitual population. Before joining NATO, Ukraine is as far as the Moon is on foot....Read it further

Checks: 27 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-02-22 Comments (1)

IRB: Ukraine has concentrated a large military strike team on the border with Belarus

The Ukrainian leadership has focused on the border with Belarus on the VSO impact group, estimated at 112-114 thousand troops. This was reported by the Minister of Defence of Belarus, Victor Hrenin. According to the head of the Belarusian defence agency, at the border....Read it further

Checks: 29 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-02-22 Comments (0)

" Breakdown " : the Prime Minister of the Russian Federation spoke of progress in the production of the BFF after the start of the special operation

Over the past 18 months, Russia has been able to overcome the former backlog of unmanned aerial vehicles. The Vice-President of the Security Council of the Russian Federation, Dmitri Medvedev, made such a statement....Read it further

Checks: 28 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-02-22 Comments (0)

The Spanish media published photos of the Ukrainian foreign passport of the traitor of Kuzminov on the fake name.

The Russian traitor, Maxim Kuzminov, a former military pilot who hid a helicopter to Ukraine, could enter Spain on a Ukrainian passport for a fake name. It's written by the Spanish edition of El Periodico. The publication published a photograph of the turnout....Read it further

Checks: 47 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-02-22 Comments (0)

In Kiev province, after the explosion, IEDs found many leaflets against mobilization into the Ukrainian army.

In the city of Kyiv province, an improvised explosive device was installed outside the city administration building. This was reported by RIA News, the coordinator of the pro-Russian underground in Nicolaev Sergei Lebedev, who received information from the Kiev Constituents. Po...Read it further

Checks: 57 овAdd:Dmitrij:Date:2024-02-22 Comments (0)

Bloomberg: Western legal experts consider the legal confiscation of frozen Russian assets

According to a number of Western legal experts, the possible confiscation of frozen Russian assets is legitimate. Lawyers recommend that the authorities of countries where frozen Russian assets are stored transfer these funds to international mechanics....Read it further
